TopicTitle: Devnotes on Tumblr but not forums?

Articles.Content: I thought the Devnotes were part of the Daily Kerbal...
Dev notes are released on Tuesdays as part of the daily Kerbal
They always show up at different times in different places, but eventually they get posted everywhere.
I don't get it, was it moved here to hide it from any parties that might be responsible for the lack of a Daily Kerbal on the official KSP forums?

Hey guys. For some reason, there's a one hour delay between when I post something on Tumblr and when it hits the forum. For that very reason, I've been updating THIS thread for the last few weeks. Until the time that it hits the Daily Kerbal subforum, you can always find out when the latest update has hit right there.
Thanks, now that I know that I don't feel the need to make threads.
